summary: Full-Stack Software Developer with nearly 2 years of experience in fintech, specializing in real-time data platforms and AI-powered analytics using Python, React, Nest.js, TypeScript, PostgreSQL, Django DRF, and Docker.

achievements: Built and optimized FeedSense.ai, a real-time stock analytics platform using React, Nest.js, Node.js, and TypeScript, reducing system latency by 40% and enhancing scalability.
Integrated AI-driven equity prediction models for Nifty 50 and large-cap stocks, improving forecast accuracy by 25%.
Worked on LLM-powered financial insights using RAG pipelines with Chroma vector database, enabling contextual query responses and personalized analytics.
Implemented real-time data pipelines with WebSocket.io and Redis, enabling seamless processing of live market data for instant analytics.
Led architecture and scaling of FeedSenseV2, launching a revenue-generating analytics tool.

projects.name: Budget Tracker – AI-Powered Personal Finance Web App
projects.subtitle: React + Django Full-Stack Application
projects.description: Full-stack application for expense tracking, budget planning, and interactive charts (D3.js). Integrated AI Advisor (Google Gemini) for personalized insights and savings tips. Secure authentication with responsive UI (Ant Design); deployed on Vercel (frontend) and Railway (backend).
